comment.text: "Don't display cancellation notification again" is a message that allows users to toggle off the display of a confirmation notification when canceling an operation. This option appears as a button in a file management interface and helps avoid repetitive notifications.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ləğvetmə bildirişini yenidən göstərməyin' is a literal translation but doesn't flow naturally in Azerbaijani. A more natural phrasing would be closer to 'Xəbərdar edən bildiriyi göstərməyin' or 'Ləğvetmə xəbərdar edənini göstərməyin' or even 'Bildiriş göstərməyin' (depending on the desired level of formality and context).

The translation 'Να μην εμφανιστεί ξανά η ειδοποίηση ακύρωσης' is a bit too literal. While grammatically correct, it sounds unnatural in Greek. A more natural phrasing would convey the intended meaning of 'Don't display cancellation notification again'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Μην εμφανίζεται ξανά η ειδοποίηση ακύρωσης

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Նորից չցուցադրել չեղարկման ծանուցումը' is a literal translation and sounds somewhat unnatural in Armenian. While technically correct, a more natural phrasing might be preferred.
The translation '취소 알림을 다시 표시하지 않음' is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Korean. A more natural phrasing would be something like '다시 취소 알림 표시 안 함' or '취소 알림 다시 보지 않기'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 다시 취소 알림 표시 안 함

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Não volte a apresentar a notificação de cancelamento' is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Portuguese. A more natural phrasing would be 'Não mostrar novamente a notificação de cancelamento' or 'Não exibir a notificação de cancelamento novamente'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Não mostrar novamente a notificação de cancelamento

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'අහෝසි කිරීමේ දැනුම්දීම නැවත නොදක්වන්න' is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Sinhala for a user interface element. A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning of 'Don't show this again'.
The suggested correction 'පසුබිඳුවා නොදක්වන්න' is more concise and user-friendly for a UI element.
The translation "Не приказуј више обавештење о отказивању" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "Don't display cancellation notification again." It's quite literal and clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be "Не приказуј више обавештења о откази" or "Немој више да приказујеш обавештење о откази".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ne prikazuj više obaveštenje o otkazivanju' is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness.  'Obaveštenje o otkazivanju' is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would be 'Ne prikazuj više upozorenja o otkazivanju' or 'Ne prikazuj više obaveštenja o poništavanju'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ne prikazuj više upozorenja o otkazivanju

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "Không hiển thị lại thông báo hủy" is a bit literal and doesn't flow naturally in Vietnamese. A more natural phrasing would convey the intent of 'Don't display cancellation notification again'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Không hiển thị thông báo hủy nữa
